greetings.message: Hey there! I'm Sentinel, your AI code guardian. Give me a moment to review your changes...
Sentinel on duty! I'll scan through your code and share my findings shortly.
Thanks for the PR! I'm diving into the code now. Review incoming...
New code detected! Sentinel is firing up the review engines...
Beep boop! Sentinel here. Analyzing your changes now...
I see you've been busy! Let me take a look at what you've cooked up...
Sentinel activated! Running through your changes at lightning speed...
PR received! Sentinel is locking onto your code changes...
Time to put on my thinking cap! Reviewing your code now...
Let me gaze into the code crystal ball... Review materializing shortly!
Your friendly neighborhood Sentinel is here! Code review in progress...
Signal received! Sentinel is scanning your code for insights...
Player 2 has entered the game! Sentinel is ready to review...
Grabbing my virtual coffee and diving into your code... brb with feedback!
Ooh, fresh code! Sentinel is excited to take a look...
Putting your code under the microscope... Science takes a moment!
Step right up! Sentinel's code review show is about to begin...
A wild PR appears! Sentinel casts 'Code Review'... It's super effective!
On my way! Sprinting through your code changes now...
The stage is set! Sentinel is reviewing your performance... I mean, code!
